text: Skansen is an open air museum and zoo on the island Djurgården in the town of Stockholm in Sweden. It was opened in 1891, on the initiative of Artur Hazelius (1833–1901). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1891 establishments in Sweden Category:Buildings and structures in Stockholm Category:Zoos Category:Open air museums Category:Djurgården Category:Organizations based in Stockholm
title: Skansen
